name: Skeeball: On the Go
description:
Ever had an itch to just play skeeball wherever you are?

Want to play on your bed? 

Want to play while on the toilet?

With passthrough, you can play skeeball wherever your heart desires!

Developer with Ocuclus (Meta) Quest in mind. Not played on other VR headsets.

Disclaimer: Please do not play this in any potentially dangerous areas which can cause harm or worse.
